short_description: LUGGAGE STRAPS SET INCLUDES: The package includes 1 long suitcase strap, 2 short suitcase straps, 1 strap buckle and 1 water bottle clip. These TSA accessible straps can secure a bag, a water bottle, and multiple suitcases, making it easier to carry your luggage

SECURELY BUNDLED: Stably fix up to 3 suitcases ranging from 24 to 30 inches using adjustable straps, elastic thick ropes and strap buckle. The long strap connected with strap buckle is used to horizontally fix multiple suitcases. Short ropes are used to secure the top of the suitcases and fasten a bag to the suitcase. Also with a short strap and buckle combined can extend to about 59'' (150cm), suitable for two small suitcases like two 21'' ones

ULTRA WIDE RANGE ADJUSTMENT: By adjusting the strap length and stretching the elastic rope, the long strap with buckle can extend to 109 inches (277 cm), and the short strap can extend to 48 inches (122 cm)

5MM THICK ELASTIC ROPE: Constructed from 60-strand, 5mm thick elastic cord, this high-tensile rope delivers exceptional stretch—extending up to twice its original length. It's built for long-term performance, with proven resilience against stretch fatigue even after repeated use.
HEAVY DUTY STRAPS: The travel strap is made from a 5cm wide, high-quality polyester webbing, effectively securing suitcases and backpacks during travel
PORTABLE STORAGE: When rolled up, it measures only 3.1’’ x 2.7’’ (8cm x 7cm), making it easy to carry. The mesh bag provided can accommodate all the bags and buckles.
The function of this luggage strap is to secure multiple suitcases and backpacks together for easier transport. It is not designed or safe to be used as a seatbelt for luggage.
